name: Somersault Cloud
description: Sun Wukong leaps onto his cloud, leaving a Pet behind to fight. While on the cloud Sun Wukong is invisible, and regenerates health. He may leap off before the duration expires, dealing damage. The Pet inherits a percentage of Sun Wukong's current strength and defense. The Pet is killed instantly if hit by a hard Crowd Control excluding Banishes and Knockbacks. If the Pet dies, Sun Wukong is revealed on his cloud.
